level.heading: Maintenance.
level.text: An owner subject to this subchapter shall maintain each smoke detector in a reliable operating condition and shall make periodic inspections and tests to ensure that each smoke detector is in proper working condition.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 6-751.01.
